member.name: T:iText.Forms.PdfPageFormCopier
member.summary: A sample implementation of the {#link IPdfPageExtraCopier} interface which copies only AcroForm fields to a new page.
member.remarks:
A sample implementation of the {#link IPdfPageExtraCopier} interface which copies only AcroForm fields to a new page.
NOTE: While it's absolutely not necessary to use the same PdfPageFormCopier instance for copying operations, it is still worth to know that PdfPageFormCopier uses some caching logic which can potentially improve performance in case of the reusing of the same instance.

member.name: M:iText.Forms.PdfSigFieldLockDictionary.SetFieldLock(iText.Forms.PdfSigFieldLockDictionary.LockAction,System.String[])
member.summary: Sets signature lock for specific fields in the document.
member.param: Indicates the set of fields that should be locked after the actual signing of the corresponding signature takes place.
Names indicating the fields.

member.name: T:iText.Forms.PdfSigFieldLockDictionary.LockAction
member.summary: Enumerates the different actions of a signature field lock.
member.remarks:
Enumerates the different actions of a signature field lock. Indicates the set of fields that should be locked when the corresponding signature field is signed:
all the fields in the document,
all the fields specified in the /Fields array,
all the fields except those specified in the /Fields array.

member.name: T:iText.Forms.PdfSigFieldLockDictionary.LockPermissions
member.summary:
Enumerates the different levels of access permissions granted for the document when the corresponding signature field is signed:
- no changes to the document are permitted; any change to the document invalidates the signature,
- permitted changes are filling in forms, instantiating page templates, and signing; other changes invalidate the signature,
- permitted changes are the same as for the previous, as well as annotation creation, deletion, and modification; other changes invalidate the signature.
